description: The statement aimed at students echoed a debunked conspiracy theory and was spotted by teachers.
title: France apology after history textbook links CIA to 9/11
title_page: France apology after history textbook links CIA to 9/11 - BBC News
maintext: More than 18 years after 19 al-Qaeda jihadists hijacked planes and crashed them into the World Trade Center, the Pentagon and a field in Pennsylvania, a man dubbed the architect of the attacks is due to appear in a US military court this week. Khalid Sheikh Mohammed is being held at Guantanamo Bay and was a close ally of Osama bin Laden; 2,997 people lost their lives in the attacks.
